content: front 1 raglan st 14 14 14 16 16 sts left sleeve 1 raglan st 34 36 38 38 42 sts back 1 raglan st 14 14 14 16 16 sts right sleeve 1 raglan st 17 18 19 19 21 sts right front raglan increases & elevation now work short row to shape the neckline while at the same time work raglan increases on both sides of the raglan stitch use the bobby pin elevation technique when working short row for detailed instructions see video at hunglish knitter youtube channel work as follows row 1 rs *knit to raglan stitch m1r slip marker knit raglan stitch slip marker m1l* work from * to * a total of 4 times knit1 place bobby pin turn 8 sts have been increased row 2 ws purl to the last marker slip marker purl 2 stitches place bobby pin and turn row 3 rs * knit to raglan stitch m1r slip marker knit raglan sts slip marker m1l * work from * to * a total of 4 times knit to the gap place the stitch with the bobby pin from behind on the left needle and knit the next two stitches together knit 1 place bobby pin turn 8 sts have been increased row 4 ws purl to the gap slip_stitch after the gap from the left needle to the right needle page 2 of 7 place stitch from the bobby pin on the left needle slip back the stitch from the right needle back on the left needle and purl these two stitches together purl 1 replace the bobby pin and turn row 5 rs repeat row 3 8 sts have been increased row 6 ws repeat row 4 row 7 rs repeat row 3 8 sts have been increased row 8 ws repeat row 4 row 9 rs * knit to raglan stitch m1r slip marker knit raglan stitch slip marker m1l * work from * to * a total of 4 times knit to the gap place the stitch with the bobby pin from behind on the left needle and knit the next two stitches together knit to the end of the row and turn 8 sts have been increased row 10 ws purl to the gap slip_stitch after the gap from the left needle to the right needle place stitch from the bobby pin on the left needle slip back the stitch from the right needle back on the left needle and purl these two stitches together and purl to the end of the row the shaping of the neckline with short row has been completed there is now a total of 140 144 148 152 160 sts on the needle distribution of sts 22 23 24 24 26 sts left front 1 raglan sts 24 24 24 26 26 sts left sleeve 1 raglan sts 44 46 48 48 52 sts back 1 raglan sts 24 24 24 26 26 sts right sleeve 1 raglan sts 22
